Desc.eng: Don't be afraid! I'm still human... but not for long.
I know I shouldn't trust you, but it's worth a try.
You will just unleash more nightmares on us. I'm not falling for this.
Once I was a member of the First Borgovian Void Expedition. A promising psychic. Now I'm just a monstrosity in self-exile. A Dreamer.
Oh, one of the talented who can shape the Ink by sheer force of will? Until they go mad and kill themselves?
Indeed. I dream things into existence. Like this island or some of the creatures you were fighting.
You didn't waste your time then. What do you want from me?
The more things I dreamt to life, the more deformities I had to bear. Then my creations started to turn to evil. Now I can barely control the dreams and it fills me with horror.
Are you looking for an executioner?
I just want to help before I lose my sanity. I need Rust Fragments to fuel my dreams. Collect some and I will use it to forge a powerful artifact against your nemesis.
